posts.post_content:
After several years of slowly working on a nice collector grade set I am looking to sell my partial set which is 25% complete to date.  I have thought about different options for selling and decided to put it up here to see what kind of interest exists.

I do not have scans of all the cards yet but will be working on it in the next week.  To describe the condition right off the top of my head I would say 80% P-F 15% G-VG 5% A.  Tried to be picky about most of the P-F cards I bought and many of them have great fronts and paper loss or other back damage.

I am asking $3200 shipped and insured for the lot and intend to sell them as a group.  Will provide scans to serious inquiries in the next week or two (be patient, much going on right now).

This is a list of cards with some of the highlights on the top:


* Davis, George* Throwing        HOF
* Chance, Frank* Yellow Portrait        HOF
* Bender, Chief* Trees                     HOF

* Huggins, Miller* Hands to mouth        HOF

I would like to see pics, front and backs of the HOFers and the missing red ink card.
thanks

Hello Jim


I have sent entire amt to you in money orders this past thursday. Unsure if it has arrived to you yet. 

Let me know please.

Thanks

Frank
